short_summary: The procurement is looking for 90 Light Tactical Vehicles (LTVs) and ancillary equipment.
description: The Department of National Defence has an urgent requirement to procure 90 Light Tactical Vehicles (LTVs), ancillary equipment and Integrated Logistics Support, including Initial Cadre Training (ICT), electronic technical publications and other data deliverables in accordance with the requirements of the RFP.  The requirement includes an option to procure up to 18 additional LTV’s.  The requirement also includes the provision of Ready Packs, Special Tooling and Test Equipment and the supply of spare parts to support the LTV fleet for a period of two (2) years.   There is no requirement for In-Service Support (ISS)  for this procurement.  The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
tags: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall  Proposal
Nature of Requirements: Light Tactical Vehicle - RFP
National Security Exception (NSE) applies to this procurement.
full_summary:
# LTV - RFP Tender Notice
## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-246786/C
* **Reference Number**: PW-__BL-319-29341
* **Publication Date**: April 19, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Amendment Date**: May 14, 2024

## Tender Information

* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence has an urgent requirement to procure 90 Light Tactical Vehicles (LTVs), ancillary equipment and integrated logistics support. The requirement includes an option to procure up to 18 additional LTVs. The contract also includes the provision of spare parts, Special Tooling, and Test Equipment to support the LTV fleet for a period of two years. A National Security Exception (NSE) applies to this procurement.

## Documents

All documents related to this tender are available on the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Panarella, Riccardo, Email: [riccardo.panarella@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:riccardo.panarella@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca), Phone: (343) 573-0884
* **End User Entities**: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

## Important Details

* Delivery Date: August 1, 2024
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. I worked on reframing the provided text and reorganizing it to improve clarity and coherence.
